==Descriptions==
{{Description|Meals here in the [[Fortress of Meropide]] are mainly provided by the Coupon Cafeteria. It's also worth mentioning that one person can receive one Welfare Meal per day that includes a free meal full of surprises and a fortune slip.<br>With enough Credit Coupons, one can also purchase meals to their liking.<br><br>For more information about the distribution of Welfare Meals, please consult [[Bran]], the clockwork meka, who is an employee of the Coupon Cafeteria.|[https://act.hoyoverse.com/puzzle/hk4e/pz_GG6bYzKjUi/index.html Version 4.1 New Contents Display Page]}}
